backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing clients, tasks, assignees, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations and per‑caller storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three frontend task‑form related features to their modified files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for quick build‑planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining theme tokens and dark‑mode variables in OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and linking favicon and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup handling authentication, profile bootstrapping, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for uploading assignees via CSV with parsing, validation, preview, and bulk‑create mutation.
Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting assignees with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting a newly signed-in user to save their display name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for logged‑out users providing branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for CSV-based client bulk upload including template download, parsing, validation, and batch creation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting a single client with basic validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, header, responsive mobile menu, and user profile/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Bulk editing dialog that applies selected field updates to multiple tasks and submits them via a bulk update hook.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for uploading tasks from a CSV file, validating entries, and submitting them through a bulk create hook.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Form dialog for creating or editing a single task, handling all task fields and submitting via create or update hooks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector for quickly updating a task’s status using the update hook.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses with helpers for normalization, validation, and display mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on tasks using the actor API, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Exposes hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities and login state with AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utilities for parsing and encoding client data kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Displays, filters, edits, and bulk-manages assignees with dialogs and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed client info with related tasks, stats, and dialogs for editing and task creation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Clients listing page with search, selection, bulk delete, and dialogs for create and CSV upload.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing task statistics, revenue summaries, and upcoming/overdue tasks with navigation filters.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Tasks table with search, filtering, bulk actions, and dialogs for create, edit, upload, and delete.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and parses CSV files for assignee bulk upload with validation and backend mapping.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Generates and parses client CSV files for bulk upload, validating required fields and formatting output.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides functions to compute task statistics including revenue, status counts, and category totals.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Generates task upload CSV templates and parses task CSV files with validation for all task fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL query/hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, requirements, features, known issues, and architectural notes for a task/client management app.
